protocol.text: The data was analyzed with rma function in R/Bioconductor package affy using default settings. ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 RMA signal
12 day-old Arabidopsis seedlings grown on ½ MS agar plates with 1% sucrose and adapted to 10 µE m−2 s−1 continuous light for 7 d were exposed to HL stress (1000 µE m−2 s−1) following a 3h dark period
12 day-old Arabidopsis seedlings grown on ½ MS agar plates with 1% sucrose and adapted to 10 µE m−2 s−1 continuous light for 7 d

Total cellular RNA was extracted using the NucleoSpin RNA Plant kit (Macherey-Nagel) according to the manufacturer’s instructions, without DNase digestion. The remaining DNA was digested using Ambion® DNA-free™ DNase Treatment and Removal Reagents (Invitrogen).
NuGEN’s Encore Biotin Module (Cat. No. 4200-12) was used to fragment 3.95 µg cDNA followed by Biotin-labeling according to the manufacturers’ instructions.

Hybridization solution was prepared according to Affymetrix´ 3’ GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual . The final concentration of cDNA is 17 ng/μl. • Hybridization was performed for 18+/-2 hours at 45°C and 60 rpm in a rotating hybridization oven (Hybridization Oven 640, Affymetrix).
Scanning was performed with the GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G (Affymetrix), which is controlled by Affymetrix´ software GeneChip Operating System (GCOS) v1.4.
